pullRequest.title: refactor: Simplify the KubernetesClient DSL
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This pull request simplifies the DSL in the following manner.

Removes Type parameters when actual parameter never changes:

Boolean
Watch


Collapse parameters that refer to the some thing (input, output types).
Eliminate the need for Doneable.class.

Type of change


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 Feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change
 Chore (non-breaking change which doesn't affect codebase;
test, version modification, documentation, etc.)

The PR is still work in progress and the modules currently aligned with the change are:

kubernetes-client
